{{cpp/title|vprint_nonunicode{{small|(std::ostream)}}}}
{{cpp/io/basic_ostream/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|ostream}}
{{dcl|since=c++23|1=
void vprint_nonunicode( std::ostream&amp; os, std::string_view fmt, std::format_args args );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Behaves as {{named req|FormattedOutputFunction}} (except that some details of error reporting [[#Exceptions|differ]]):
* First, constructs and checks the {{rlp|sentry}} object.
* Then, initializes an automatic variable as if by {{c|1=std::string out = std::vformat(os.getloc(), fmt, args);}}.
* Finally, inserts the character sequence {{tt|[out.begin(), out.end())}} into {{c|os}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|os|output stream to insert data into}}
{{par|fmt|{{include|cpp/utility/format/format string}}}}
{{par|args|arguments to be formatted}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
